description: This depicts a surreal scene where the burning city of Chicago is observed by two cows on a hillside, one seemingly reporting the success of a mission. The absurd premise lies in attributing a devastating urban fire, possibly referencing the Great Chicago Fire, to a bovine secret agent designated as 'agent 6373'. The irony highlights the contrast between the scale of the destruction and the mundane, domestic image of cows, suggesting a humorous subversion of typical espionage narratives.
caption: It seems that agent 6373 has accomplished her mission.

other_text.location: bottom right corner of the panel
